name: (Annual) World 1 Warm-Up
description: For when you just want to see the story.
requirement: Play Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1 in Infantile Mode.

bits.text: Complete World 1, Zone 1 on Infantile Mode.
Complete World 1, Zone 2 on Infantile Mode.
Complete World 1, Zone 3 on Infantile Mode.
